What to Do

Implement authentication on the server-side.

Why

Server-side authentication should be used, because client-side authentication is easy to bypass.

How

To implement server-side authentication, use authentication controls provided by the framework, or use a well-known third-party authentication library. If you have to implement your own authentication controls, design them to perform authentication on the server-side.
